user_question: How can I secure my home network from cyber threats and generate a diagram of a secure network setup?
final_answer: To secure your home network, use a strong password for your Wi-Fi, enable network encryption, update your router firmware, disable remote management, and use a firewall. Diagram of a secure network setup generated. Recommended software tools for monitoring network security include Wireshark, GlassWire, and Bitdefender Home Scanner.
